page.text: This function returns a list of ntg_group_call_struct instances, each containing information about an active group call associated with the channel or group. You should provide a buffer as an array of ntg_group_call_struct elements with a size matching the value returned by ntg_calls_count. The function populates this list with data for active group calls and returns the number of group calls retrieved.

subtext.text: The buffer that will hold the retrieved group call information.
